attributes.action: Reduce the petrol price, people cannot afford to drive if the price carries on to rise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All we want is affordable fuel, we pay the most tax on fuel in whole the European Ecconomic Area, which i think is out of order. I petition the prime minister to reduce the tax on living and on fuel in accordence with our EEC (EU) counterparts or face economic collapse within the UK!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
